data.title: Communication Agency
data.meta_description: We're creative thinkers, strategic explorers and full-time perfectionists with the desire for bold ideas and a sweet tooth for flawless execution.
data.text:
LETâ€™S BAKE GREAT THINGS TOGETHER

The Bakers is an independent creative agency located in Lisbon, with an appetite for storytelling

and fresh ideas, wherever they may come from.

We believe that collaboration is the lifeblood of creativity so we can be either big or small

depending on whichever brand challenge is at hand, by inviting

the right people to the table, with the proper amount of experience and expertise.

So come on in and take a seat, everyone who is hungry for ideas is always welcome at our table.
